title: Charge moves at constant speed in electric field

content.question: A positive electric charge is moved at a constant speed between two locations in an electric field, with no work done by or against the field at any time during the motion. This situation can occur only if the

choices.label: charge is moved in the direction of the field
charge is moved opposite to the direction of the field
charge is moved perpendicular to an equipotential line
charge is moved along an equipotential line

content.answer: charge is moved along an equipotential line

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
